trans-unit.resname: PS17·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gideon of the Trials
trans-unit.target: Gideon of the Trials

trans-unit.resname: PS17·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Until your next turn, prevent all damage target permanent would deal.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Until your next turn, prevent all damage target permanent would deal.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [0]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
trans-unit.target: [0]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [0]: You get an emblem with "As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game."
trans-unit.target: [0]: You get an emblem with "As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game."

trans-unit.target: [−2]: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.target: [−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, counter that spell."

trans-unit.target: [+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·97 | Liliana, Death's Majesty | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·97 | Liliana, Death's Majesty | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: [−7]: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

trans-unit.target: Chandra, Torch of Defiance

trans-unit.resname: PS17·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PS17·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.

trans-unit.target: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."

trans-unit.resname: PS17·140 | Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh | Card Name

trans-unit.target: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh

trans-unit.resname: PS17·140 | Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: [+2]: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·140 | Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·140 | Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−4]: CARDNAME deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: [−4]: CARDNAME deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·140 | Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh | Card Text | Paragraph 4

trans-unit.target: [−12]: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·204 | Nissa, Steward of Elements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa, Steward of Elements
trans-unit.target: Nissa, Steward of Elements

trans-unit.resname: PS17·204 | Nissa, Steward of Elements | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PS17·204 | Nissa, Steward of Elements | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [0]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card or a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of loyalty counters on CARDNAME, you may put that card onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: [0]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card or a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of loyalty counters on CARDNAME, you may put that card onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PS17·204 | Nissa, Steward of Elements | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−6]: Untap up to two target lands you control. They become 5/5 Elemental creatures with flying and haste until end of turn. They're still lands.
trans-unit.target: [−6]: Untap up to two target lands you control. They become 5/5 Elemental creatures with flying and haste until end of turn. They're still lands.
